short_description.html: With Grubhub gift cards, friends and family can order food delivery anytime from their favorite restaurants.

sales_rules.name: Tango $5 off
sales_rules.description: $5 off your first order of $50 or more.
sales_rules.terms_and_conditions: Promo code TANGO5 provides $5 off your first order of $50 or more (max discount $5) at Giftcards.com for new customers only; existing customers are not eligible. This one-time use code cannot be combined with other offers, and only one promo code per customer per transaction is allowed unless otherwise specified. The promotion is valid from 11/19/2024 through 12/31/2024 or while supplies last. We reserve the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time.

product.name: Grubhub Gift Card
product.meta_description: Buy Grubhub Physical Gift Cards starting at $10 instantly from Giftcards.com. Delivered safe & quickly
product.redemption_text: Click "Add gift card" under the Review Order screen. Enter the gift card number above and click "Apply" or "Add to my account"

short_description.html: With Grubhub gift cards, friends and family can order food delivery anytime from their favorite restaurants.

product.terms_and_conditions: By using this gift card, you accept the following terms and conditions. This card is redeemable via grubhub.com or the Grubhub app on eligible orders in markets where Grubhub is available within the U.S. only. Must have a Grubhub account and must provide a secondary method of payment accepted by Grubhub to complete a purchase. Gift cards may not be redeemable on certain orders or accounts (including certain campus dining accounts). Gift cards cannot be reloaded, resold, combined with cash, used to purchase other gift cards, transferred for value, or redeemed for cash, except to the extent required by law. Protect this card like cash. Issuer is not responsible for lost or stolen cards, or unauthorized use. This card is issued by Grubhub Holdings Inc. For customer service, balance inquiries, and full terms visit grubhub.com/giftcards or call 877-951-2500.
